title: Weak password allowed hackers to sink a 158-year-old company
description: Transport company KNP forced to shut down after international hacker gangs target thousands of UK businesses.
content:
One password is believed to have been all it took for a ransomware gang to destroy a 158-year-old company and put 700 people out of work.
KNP - a Northamptonshire transport company - is just one of tens of thousands of UK businesses that have been hi... [863 chars]

title: Final report into 'broken' water industry in England and Wales to be released
description: The major review led by former Bank of England deputy governor Sir Jon Cunliffe has been issued by the government to "clean up our water once and for all".
content:
A new 'consumer champion' for England's water industry, government says

title: Pension Commission to look at why four-in-ten fail to save enough
description: Future pensioners are set to be worse off than today's with four-in-10 not saving enough for retirement, says the DWP.
content:

title: Four arrested under Terrorism Act during Liverpool pro-Palestine protest
description: Merseyside police says material in support of Palestine Action was reportedly seen in possession of protesters
content:
Four people were arrested on suspicion of terrorism offences during a pro-Palestine protest in Liverpool city centre on Sunday afternoon, police said.
Merseyside police said material in support of campaign group Palestine Action was reportedly seen i... [1958 chars]
